name: Aerochrome
description:
The rainbow has been broken into pieces and scattered across space. Travel across the solar system and pick up all the crystals to rebuild the rainbow piece by piece!

Your ship can be manoeuvred in many ways - rotate around the three cardinal axes and speed forward using your engine. You can boost forward to navigate through empty space or brake (in space?) to steer round planetoids.

This was a game I made back in May 2017 for the Warwick Game Design double-theme 'Unexpected/Rainbow'. It's probably one of the more complete jam games I made, and I remember being really happy with how it turned out, so I'm very belatedly uploading it.

Apparently I made a version after this, but it broke the lighting.
